name: ConvertJobResultToSignal
description:
Convert a job result to a signal for detection purposes.

Use this tool to transform a job result into a signal, useful for detection and monitoring in Datadog.

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request that is used to convert the job result to a signal.

parameters.name: job_result_ids
parameters.description: Array of job result IDs to convert into signals.

parameters.name: notifications_sent
parameters.description: List of notification types sent related to the signal.

parameters.name: signal_message
parameters.description: Message content of the generated signals to be converted.

parameters.name: signal_severity
parameters.description: Severity level of the security signal. Accepts values: info, low, medium, high, critical.
